sosawl.name: Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life

categories.name: Proposal
categories.rules:
Timing starts when you confirm the player's name and pronouns..  
Timing ends when regular gameplay continues after the proposal cutscene ends.

The Player must be the one to propose to each candidate.

sosfomt.name: Story of Seasons: Friends of Mineral Town

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
-Timing begins upon confirming character name, birth date and difficulty level

-Timing ends upon the screen fading to black after you walk out of the church


-All glitches and exploits are allowed

categories.name: All Achievements
categories.rules:
-Timing begins upon confirming character name, birth date and difficulty mode

-Timing ends upon showing 35/35 completed achievements in the bookshelf menu

-Runs must be done on a fresh profile with no achievements unlocked from the beginning

-All glitches and exploits are allowed

categories.name: All Power Berries
categories.rules:
-Timing begins upon confirming character name, birth date and difficulty level

-Timing ends upon showing 10/10 Power Berries + the Kappa Berry on the status menu

-All glitches and exploits are allowed

categories.name: Individual Trophies
categories.rules: -Time starts when you confirm name, birthday, and difficulty.

subcategories.name: Any%
subcategories.rules:
Timer starts when you confirm birthdate

Timer ends when the screen fades to black.

subcategories.name: Thomas' Request
subcategories.rules:
-Time starts upon confirming name, birthday, and difficulty

-Time ends when Mayor Thomas walks off your farm and you regain control

sospoot.name: Story of Seasons: Pioneers of Olive Town

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
RTA Timing.

Time starts after you select the customization of your character and scooter and the intro cutscene begins.

Time ends when the screen becomes fully white during the fade to white after the wedding.

categories.name: All Animal Photos
categories.rules:
RTA Timing.

Time starts after you select the customization of your character and scooter and the intro cutscene begins.

Time ends when the player steps on the tile between the first row of animals in a completed animal museum.

categories.name: Town Restoration
categories.rules:
RTA Timing.

Time starts after you select the customization of your character and scooter and the intro cutscene begins.

Time ends when the screen fades out fully and the credits begin.

categories.name: Mystery Files
categories.rules:
RTA Timing.

Time starts after you select the customization of your character and scooter and the intro cutscene begins.

Time ends when the achievement pop-up appears.

sos3ot.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
